Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function

Class IFunction.Builder

java.lang.Object
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction.Builder
Enclosing interface:
IFunction
public static final class IFunction.Builder extends Object
Used to create a function's signature using a builder pattern.
